article.title: GCC2019 - Freiburg, DE

inserts.name: /events/gcc2019/header
inserts.content:
Program | Training | CoFest | Abstracts | Register | Venue | FAQ | Childcare | Sponsors | Conduct | Promotion | Org

2019 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2019)

Freiburg, Germany, 1-6 July 2019

Conference book

#usegalaxy / chat

article.content:
table-of-contents ================= end-table-of-contents ===================== **GCC2019 was held in Freiburg, Germany, 1-6 July.** Like [previous Galaxy Community Conferences](/gcc/), GCC2019 it [featured](https://gcc2019.sched.com/) invited talks, accepted talks, [posters](https://gcc2019.sched.com/overview/type/C.+Posters+%2F+Demos+%2F+Sponsors/Posters) and [demos](https://gcc2019.sched.com/overview/type/C.+Posters+%2F+Demos+%2F+Sponsors/Demos), [birds-of-a-feather (BoF) gatherings](https://gcc2019.sched.com/overview/type/D.+Break+%2F+Social+%2F+Networking+%2F+Meal/BoFs), multiple days of collaborative work, and plenty of opportunities to network with your fellow data-intensive researchers and practitioners. If you are working in data-intensive life science, there was no better place to be. Location --------
[](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Altstadt,_Freiburg,_Germany_-_panoramio_%282%29.jpg)
[Freiburg](https://visit.freiburg.de/en) is on the edge of the Black Forest, and is famous for its architecture, cobblestone streets and historic districts, and is home to one of Germany's oldest universities (and our host)! Freiburg is in the Baden wine-growing region and *is the sunniest city in Germany.* GCC2019 will be held at [Konzerthaus Freiburg](http://www.konzerthaus.freiburg.de/) in central Freiburg, adjacent to the [Freiburg train station](https://www.bahnhof.de/bahnhof-de/Freiburg\_\_Breisgau\_\_Hbf-1039062). Program ------- GCC2019 spans more than a week of activity:
[Training Day](https://gcc2019.sched.com/#2019-07-01)
Mon 1 Jul 		[Conference](https://gcc2019.sched.com/#2019-07-02)
Tue-Thu 2-4 Jul 		[CoFest: Core](/src/events/gcc2019/cofest/index.md)
Fri-Sat 5-6 Jul 		[CoFest: Encore](/src/events/gcc2019/cofest/index.md)
Sun-Mon 7-8 Jul
Morning [Parallel introductory training tracks](https://gcc2019.sched.com/#2019-07-01) Talks: Invited, accepted, and lightning Collaboration! More collaboration!
Early Afternoon [Parallel introductory training tracks](https://gcc2019.sched.com/#2019-07-01) Training sessions: 6 tracks
[Poster, Demo and Sponsor Session](https://gcc2019.sched.com/overview/type/C.+Posters+%2F+Demos+%2F+Sponsors)		 Collaboration! More collaboration!
Late Afternoon [Parallel introductory training tracks](https://gcc2019.sched.com/#2019-07-01) Training sessions: 6 tracks
Talks: Invited, accepted, and lightning		 Collaboration! More collaboration!
Evening [Birds-of-a-Feather (BoFs)](https://gcc2019.sched.com/overview/type/D.+Break+%2F+Social+%2F+Networking+%2F+Meal/BoFs) and other informal networking [BoFs](https://gcc2019.sched.com/overview/type/D.+Break+%2F+Social+%2F+Networking+%2F+Meal/BoFs) and other informal networking; [Conference Dinner (Wed)](https://sched.co/LufW) Informal networking *Really* informal networking
**See the [full online program](https://gcc2019.sched.com/) for details.** Hosts -----
[](https://galaxyproject.eu/freiburg)    [](http://www.uni-freiburg.de/)      [](https://www.denbi.de/)

GCC2019 is hosted by the [Freiburg Galaxy Project](https://galaxyproject.eu/freiburg), the [University of Freiburg](http://www.uni-freiburg.de/), and [de.NBI (the German Network for Bioinformatics Infrastructure)](https://www.denbi.de/). Sponsors ========
[](https://elixir-europe.org/) [](https://www.limagrain.com/en/) [](https://www.kws.com/) [](https://elifesciences.org/labs) [](https://f1000research.com/) [](https://academic.oup.com/gigascience)
Please thank [our sponsors](/events/gcc2019/sponsors/) for helping make GCC2019 a success:
